title: The Adventures of Alice Cook: The Advising Avenger
summary: Alice Cook discovers her superpower of infallible advice over a week, using it to solve crimes and help the city while overcoming her own struggles.
summaryGerman: Alice Cook entdeckt ihre Superkraft des unfehlbaren Ratschlags über eine Woche hinweg, nutzt sie, um Verbrechen zu lösen und der Stadt zu helfen, während sie ihre eigenen Schwierigkeiten überwindet.
summaryDutch: Alice Cook ontdekt haar superkracht van onfeilbaar advies gedurende een week, gebruikt het om misdaden op te lossen en de stad te helpen terwijl ze haar eigen worstelingen overwint.
summaryFrench: Alice Cook découvre son superpouvoir de conseil infaillible au cours d'une semaine, l'utilisant pour résoudre des crimes et aider la ville tout en surmontant ses propres luttes.

story.text: Alice Cook starts her week feeling unusually insightful after a strange dream about guiding others through a maze. She feels energetic.
Driven by her newfound prowess, Alice prevents a bank heist by advising the would-be robbers on the long-term pitfalls of their plans. The mood is triumphant.
Her powers seem to grow; even random bystanders seek her advice. But Alice senses a sinister figure watching her, leaving an eerie feeling.
The mysterious observer confronts Alice, revealing himself as a villain who harnesses chaos. Alice advises him on the emptiness of his path, stirring a romantic shift in the air.
Alice guides her adversary towards redemption. The city celebrates her, the mood being epic. She feels like a true superhero now.
Reflecting on her week, Alice realizes the importance of her role. The city feels peaceful, and so does she.
Preparing for the challenges ahead, Alice feels happy about the lives she touched and the evil she transformed.

ending: As the sun set on Sunday, Alice knew she was ready for whatever the next challenge might be, with her powerful advice as her guide.
moral: The right advice at the right time can change lives and alter destinies.
